EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Turbonomic Community Appreciation Rockies vs Marlins
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/denver-community-appreciation-rockies-vs-marlins/]]> HiÂ {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We are pleased to invite you to an exclusive event on September 26th, as the Colorado Rockies take on the Miami Marlins. We are expecting a fantastic summer evening filled with food, drinks, and of course, baseball. We hope you will accept this invitation to join us, learn more about Turbonomic, and network with your peers in the technology industry. Colorado Rockies vs Miami Marlins <[[https://turbonomic.com/denver-community-appreciation-rockies-vs-marlins/]]>
Where: Coors Field 2001 Blake St., Denver, CO 80205 Tuesday, September 26th 6:40pm
We hope to see you there,
- The Turbonomic Team
